page.title: 14A day in the life of Mum
page.content: Melanie's mum repeats the same routine everyday. A coffee to start the day follows the trip to take Melanie's sister to school. She hoovers, polishes, washes the dishes and sweeps the floor downstairs. It is very tiring so she sits down to rest with a coffee and chocolate biscuits. Upstairs is next, making beds and tidying around. It is then about 11 o'clock. Then comes gardening; she inspects her plants and enjoys the sunshine. At about 2.45 pm her mum picks Melanie's sister up from school and at 3.30 pm she sits down and watches television. By 4 o'clock, however, when Melanie returns, the house is untidy again. Her mum prepares dinner next, then watches the television before bed.
